                 https://absynth-vibe-coding.github.io/

                  If you like this follow me on my 
               YouTube channel Electric Dreams, thx! 
                 
                     HeartMula for ComfyUI v1.3

                        Better speed: cfg 1
         codec_steps 1-5: 1 "fast" and still really good quality
                   2: better quality and still ok speed
   
                     Minimum 16gb VRAM, it uses all of it
          


                  Quantizaton: saves VRAM -> Faster

                  - none - Full precision (default)
                  - int8 - ~50% VRAM reduction
                  - int4 - ~75% VRAM reduction (uses nf4 quantization)
                
                         20 sec= 250 steps                  
                         40 sec= 500 steps
                         60 sec= 750 steps
 
                  Custom Tags try for example: 
     energetic, electronic, synthesizer, drum machine, self- discovery
          
              more tags on https://heartmula.github.io/

[Verse 1]
You were the shadow to my light
Did you feel us?
Another star, you fade away
Afraid our aim is out of sight
Wanna see us alight

[Pre-Chorus]
Where are you now?
Where are you now?
Where are you now?
Was it all in my fantasy?
Where are you now?
Were you only imaginary?

[Chorus]
Where are you now?
Atlantis, under the sea, under the sea
Where are you now? Another dream
The monster's running wild inside of me
I'm faded, I'm faded
So lost, I'm faded, I'm faded
So lost, I'm faded

[Verse 2]
These shallow waters never met what I needed
I'm letting go, a deeper dive
Eternal silence of the sea
I'm breathing, alive

[Pre-Chorus]
Where are you now?
Where are you now?
Under the bright but faded lights
You set my heart on fire
Where are you now?
Where are you now?

[Chorus]
Where are you now?
Atlantis, under the sea, under the sea
Where are you now? Another dream
The monster's running wild inside of me
I'm faded, I'm faded
So lost, I'm faded, I'm faded
So lost, I'm faded
